constituent: suitable, antique, vase, stand up, hood, old, tombstone, gravestone, church, ten, needle, mouth, road
heisigStory: Can you imagine anything less suitable to do with one's precious antiques than to display them in the middle of a crowded road-way?
koohiiStory1: Think of the term from televison "suitable for all audiences" to get the sense of the word. What program could be more suitable for the whole family than the "antiques road(show)".
koohiiStory2: That old thing in your attic might be suitable to be shown on the Antiques Roadshow.
myStory: phù hợp. đứng đến già vẫn quanh cái phù hợp
